hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.LW Target in Woods: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key Ring# can be found in #the Market#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that you can have complete control over the item placement, item pool, and more, using Plandomizer?

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: I wanna be a rocketship, @! Please help me live my dreams!

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #hearts#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Top

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Mirror Shield#.
